misc: Struggles with his gender identity, occasionally participating in events under his female alter-ego, "Eva".
biography: Marcus, a familiar face at Kurk Golf, is set to mark his 12th appearance at the Hector Trophée in 2025. A complex and intriguing individual, Marcus brings a unique perspective to the greens. Known for his meticulous approach to the game, he has yet to clinch the coveted Hector Trophée or the Victor Trophy.

Off the course, Marcus is known for his thoughtful demeanor and introspective nature. A true non-conformist, Marcus occasionally participates in events under the guise of his female alter-ego, Eva. This expression of his gender identity adds another layer to his enigmatic persona, making him one of the more fascinating figures in the sport.

Despite the external complexities, Marcus remains dedicated to the sport and is respected by peers for his tenacity and unwavering commitment. He is a true sportsman at heart, embodying the spirit of the game.
